1: What happened to the man who stole an Advent Calendar? He got 25 days!
2: What do they sing at a snowman’s birthday party? Freeze a jolly good fellow!
3: What kind of motorbike does Santa ride? A Holly Davidson!
4: Why was the turkey in the pop group? Because he was the only one with drumsticks!
5: What goes “Oh, Oh, Oh”? Santa walking backwards!
6: Why does Santa have three gardens? So he can ‘ho ho ho’!
7: What do snowmen wear on their heads? Ice caps!
8: What do you get when you cross a snowman with a vampire? Frostbite!
9: Why did no one bid for Rudolph and Blitzen on eBay? Because they were two deer!
10: Why don’t you ever see Santa in hospital? Because he has private elf care!
11: Why is it getting harder to buy Advent calendars? Their days are numbered!
12: What do angry mice send to each other at Christmas? Cross-mouse cards!
13: What did the beaver say to the Christmas Tree? Nice gnawing you!
14: What does Santa do with out of shape elves? Sends them to an elf Farm.
15: Who hides in the bakery at Christmas? A mince spy!
16: What do snowmen have for breakfast? Snowflakes!
17: What did Santa say to the smoker? Please don’t smoke, it’s bad for my elf!
18: What’s the most popular Christmas wine? ‘But I don’t like Brussels sprouts!’
19: Which famous playwright was terrified of Christmas? Noël Coward!
20: How many letters are in the Christmas alphabet? Only 25, there’s no L!
21: Why are Christmas trees so bad at sewing? They always drop their needles!
22: How does Christmas Day end? With the letter Y!
23: What do snowmen eat for lunch? Icebergers!
24: Who delivers presents to cats? Santa Paws!
